channel.title: Install on Krkn
channel.description: Recent content in Install on Krkn

item.title: Installation
item.description: The following ways are supported to run Kraken: Standalone python program through Git. Containerized version using either Podman or Docker as the runtime via Krkn-hub Kubernetes or OpenShift deployment ( unsupported ) Note It is recommended to run Kraken external to the cluster ( Standalone or Containerized ) hitting the Kubernetes/OpenShift API as running it internal to the cluster might be disruptive to itself and also might not report back the results if the chaos leads to clusterâ€™s API server instability.
